title: Login Success with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that users can log in successfully using valid credentials corresponding to their roles.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid username/email and password for each role: admin, truck driver, garbage collector, barangay head, resident, foreman.
Click on the login button.
Verify successful login by checking redirection to the specific dashboard based on the user role.

title: Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Ensure that users cannot log in with invalid username/email or password and receive appropriate error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter invalid or incorrect username/email and password combinations.
Click on the login button.
Check that login fails and an error message is displayed indicating invalid credentials.

title: Password Reset via Forgot Password Flow
description: Validate that users can request password reset and successfully update their password via the forgot password feature.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Click on the 'Forgot Password' link.
Submit registered email address to receive password reset instructions.
Verify an email is sent with reset instructions.
Follow the password reset link and enter a new password.
Verify the password is updated successfully and the user can log in with the new password.

title: Role-Based Route Protection
description: Ensure that routes and pages are accessible only to authorized user roles according to their permissions.

steps.description: Log in as each user role.
Attempt to access routes/pages restricted to other roles directly via URL manipulation.
Verify access is denied and the user is redirected or shown a permission error.
Access permitted routes and verify pages load correctly.

title: Admin User Management CRUD Operations
description: Verify that the admin can create, update, and delete users with appropriate roles and that changes reflect in the system.

steps.description: Log in as admin and navigate to user management.
Create new users with different roles (truck driver, garbage collector, barangay head, resident, foreman).
Verify the new users are listed and can log in.
Update user details and roles.
Confirm updates persist and reflect in the system.
Delete users from the system.
Ensure deleted users cannot log in and are removed from lists.

title: Route and Schedule Management by Admin
description: Test that the admin can create, view, update, and delete routes and schedules, and changes are reflected in dependent components.

steps.description: Log in as admin and navigate to route and schedule management.
Create daily routes with integrated map visualization using Leaflet.
Confirm that created routes display on the map and schedules are generated correctly.
Update existing routes and schedules.
Verify updates are saved and reflected throughout user dashboards.
Delete routes and schedules.
Ensure deleted routes are removed from all views and relevant users' dashboards.

title: Task Assignment and Real-Time Updates
description: Validate that admins and foremen can assign tasks to drivers and collectors and that real-time status updates and notifications are propagated correctly.

steps.description: Assign tasks to truck drivers and garbage collectors via admin or foreman dashboards.
Verify tasks appear correctly on assignees' dashboards.
Update task status (e.g., in-progress, completed) from the assignee dashboard.
Confirm that the task status updates are reflected in the admin and foreman dashboards in real time.
Check that notifications about task assignments and status changes are received by the appropriate users.

title: Special Pickup Request Workflow
description: Ensure barangay heads and foremen can submit, approve, track special pickup requests with notifications sent on status changes.

steps.description: Log in as barangay head, submit a special pickup request.
Verify the request is stored and visible in the system.
Log in as admin or foreman and approve or reject the request.
Ensure the status update is visible to the barangay head.
Confirm that notifications are sent to involved parties on request submission and status changes.

title: Issue Reporting and Tracking
description: Verify that residents and barangay heads can submit, view, and track reported issues and that status updates propagate correctly.

steps.description: Log in as resident or barangay head and submit an issue report with all required details.
Check that the issue is saved and listed in the user's issue status page.
Log in as admin or foreman and update the issue status.
Ensure the updated status is reflected for the reporter and relevant stakeholders.
Verify notifications of issue status updates are sent to the reporter.

title: Feedback Submission and Admin Review
description: Test that residents, barangay heads, and other users can submit feedback and that admins can review feedback submissions.

steps.description: Log in as resident, barangay head, or other role that supports feedback, and submit feedback.
Verify feedback submissions are stored in the database.
Log in as admin and navigate to feedback management dashboard.
Confirm feedback entries are displayed correctly with all submitted details.

title: Notification Delivery and Accuracy
description: Ensure notifications are sent timely and accurately for task updates, schedule changes, special pickup status, and issue changes to the correct users.

steps.description: Trigger events such as task assignment, task status update, schedule changes, special pickup approval, and issue status changes.
Verify that involved users receive appropriate notifications matching the event.
Open the notification panel for roles like truck driver, garbage collector, barangay head, resident, foreman.
Confirm notifications are displayed in a clear, timely, and organized manner.

title: Real-Time Route Tracking and Map Visualization
description: Validate that truck drivers and garbage collectors can view live routes on maps and task progress updates update the map display in real time.

steps.description: Log in as truck driver or garbage collector and navigate to the route run page.
Verify the assigned routes display on the Leaflet map with proper markers and paths.
Update task progress status during the route.
Ensure map updates reflect the progress changes in real time.

title: Attendance Monitoring for Foremen and Personnel
description: Test that foremen can record and retrieve attendance records of personnel such as truck drivers and garbage collectors accurately.

steps.description: Log in as foreman and navigate to attendance monitoring.
Record attendance for different personnel.
Verify attendance records are stored and can be retrieved correctly.
Search personnel attendance records using provided search feature.
Confirm search results are accurate and relevant.

title: IEC Materials Access and Download
description: Verify that residents and barangay heads can view and download IEC materials from their portals.

steps.description: Log in as resident or barangay head and navigate to the IEC materials page.
Confirm that IEC materials are displayed correctly.
Select IEC materials and download them.
Check that downloads complete successfully and the file integrity is maintained.

title: User Profile and Settings Management
description: Validate that users can view and update their profiles and account settings across all user roles.

steps.description: Log in as any user role.
Navigate to profile or settings page.
Edit profile information such as name, contact info, and preferences.
Verify changes are saved and displayed correctly on next page refresh or revisit.
Test updating password within settings.
Ensure the password change is effective and user can log in with the new password.
